CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Verifies that Computed Style preserves property expansion on re-rendering.


#inspected computed styles: 
color: rgb(0, 0, 255);
display: flex;
    flex - #inspected <style>…</style>
    OVERLOADED block - div <style>…</style>
    OVERLOADED block - div user agent stylesheet

#other computed styles: 
color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
display: inline;
    inline - #other <style>…</style>
    OVERLOADED block - div <style>…</style>
    OVERLOADED block - div user agent stylesheet
